p: Michael Robertson and Jeff Giddings, ‘Self-Advocates in Civil Legal Disputes: How Personal and Other Factors Influence the Handling of Their Cases’ (2014) 38(1) Melbourne University Law Review 119; Merran Lawler, Jeff Giddings, and Michael Robertson ‘Opportunities and Limitations in the Provision of Self-Help Legal Resources to Citizens in Need’ (2012) 30(1) Windsor Yearbook of Access to Justice 187.
